title: Add security and token management
description: Implement secure token storage, token refresh mechanisms, and proper CORS handling. Add security measures against CSRF attacks and implement token expiration handling.

comments.text: Starting security and token management implementation. Plan: add token expiry, refresh mechanism, CORS headers for API, and CSRF protection.
Implemented token expiry, CSRF protection with double submit cookie, CORS headers, refreshToken, and API route with tests.
Fix bug in header handling and expired token callback
